item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Tell HN: John Friel my father, internet pioneer and creator of QModem, has died (586 points | 57 comments)
2. "A Course of Pure Mathematics" – G. H. Hardy (1921) [pdf] (13 points | discuss)
3. Dumping Memory to Bypass BitLocker on Windows 11 (103 points | 73 comments)
4. Jack Elam and the Fly in 'Once Upon a Time in the West' (16 points | 3 comments)
5. Learning Solver Design: Automating Factorio Balancers (75 points | 6 comments)
6. The Homa Network Protocol (34 points | 4 comments)
7. Execution units are often pipelined (129 points | 57 comments)
8. How Well Do LLMs Generate Code for Different Application Domains? (26 points | 3 comments)
9. Curl-Impersonate (335 points | 77 comments)
10. Short Message Compression Using LLMs (132 points | 70 comments)
11. 'Obelisks': New Class of Life Has Been Found in Human Digestive System (253 points | 93 comments)
12. Ts_zip: Text Compression Using Large Language Models (78 points | 26 comments)
13. MiceWine – run Windows applications and games on Android smartphones (147 points | 44 comments)
14. Beyond BLE: Cracking Open the Black-Box of RF Microcontrollers [video] (81 points | 10 comments)
15. Where is James Bond? Trapped in an ugly stalemate with Amazon (93 points | 123 comments)
16. A Tricycle of the Mind (22 points | 6 comments)
17. A simple way to explore data through a Tableau-like UI directly in your data app (78 points | 7 comments)
18. Coding Font Selection 'Tournament' (5 points | 2 comments)
19. RubyConf 2024: Cloud Native Buildpack Hackday (and other Ruby deploy tools, too) (15 points | 1 comment)
20. Fun facts about SQLite (247 points | 102 comments)
21. Database mocks are not worth it (68 points | 92 comments)
22. Pincites (YC S23) is hiring a founding engineer to build legal AI agents (Remote) ( | hide)
23. YouTuber won DMCA fight with fake Nintendo lawyer by detecting spoofed email (181 points | 75 comments)
24. US credit card defaults jump to highest level since 2010 (140 points | 107 comments)
25. Empirical Study of Test Generation with LLM's (28 points | 9 comments)
26. Performance of LLMs on Advent of Code 2024 (10 points | 1 comment)
27. Show HN: I built open source file sharing solution using AWS S3 (47 points | 22 comments)
28. Apple M5 could ditch unified memory architecture for split CPU and GPU designs (59 points | 34 comments)
29. Bench to be acquired after abruptly shutting down (92 points | 62 comments)
30. Passkey technology is elegant, but it's most definitely not usable security (264 points | 278 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
